column5: Unfortunately dirtbags like this are becoming far to common in todays society.  Hopefully they do some serious jail time, and not in the country club.  Now wonder the Islanders are so crap and almost 30 points out of the last playoff spot.....
Kinda reminds me of the LA Kings crooked owner Bruce McNall. Its a shame when teams suffer from the greed.
Dont forget about the Argo fiasco.
